// Creature: Dryad
// Description: "Anti-spellcaster that has a poison attack which slows and damages enemy units. Also has Spell Immunity which renders her invulnerable to magical effects and damage. Can learn Abolish Magic. |n|n|cffffcc00Attacks land and air units.|r"
